title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best of The Herd, Colin isn't sure the Boston Celtics feel happy to be advancing to the NBA Finals (or simply just relieved) after battling the Miami Heat to the bitter end.  Plus, Colin says, "good luck" to new Los Angeles Lakers head coach Darvin Ham. Also, the path to the NBA Finals has been very different for the Golden State Warriors compared to the Boston Celtics.  Later, another edition of Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong.  Finally, Antoine Walker--NBA champion and FOX Sports NBA analyst--joins Colin to praise the Miami Heat's unbeatable spirit in the Eastern Conference Finals, Steph Curry's lasting legacy, and his pick to win the championship series. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
